item.title: Beautifuly Horid
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:40, topic:145126”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=198792.msg1775732#msg1775732 date=1190566540]

Ha…wrong. It’s wrong in your opinion, but in my opinion, this signature really looks good. Maybe it’s because I haven’t made a signature for about a year, or maybe it’s because I’m not a complete ass hole, who knows. Just because you think it’s wrong, doesn’t mean it is wrong.

[/quote]
Opinions are important[/quote]

srsly, wut.

item.title: Beautifuly Horid
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:37, topic:145126”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=198792.msg1775715#msg1775715 date=1190565666]
It doesn’t take a rocket scientist to figure out what looks good or bad.
[/quote]

No, you’re right. It takes opinion to work out whether it looks good or bad, and in my opinion it looks good.[/quote]Then why didn’t you just say that?? Instead you go off and insult me.

Read full topic

item.title: Beautifuly Horid

item.description:

exe626:

It doesn’t take a rocket scientist to figure out what looks good or bad.

item.title: Beautifuly Horid
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Well lets see, Several shades of blue, orange, peach, black, white, gray, and purple. You tell me how that works correctly, and I’ll understand. It doesn’t take a rocket scientist to figure out what looks good or bad.

item.title: Beautifuly Horid
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Oxy, post:29, topic:145126”]I was with him then it was jsut stupid flaming up this topic.[/quote]Oxy, after you posted all I said was:

[quote=“exe626, post:23, topic:145126”]fellix, I remember that one blue signature of yours has about 12 c4ds in it and epic smudging in every direction.[/quote]If thats flaming, I didn’t know it.

[quote=“Oxy, post:27, topic:145126”]Mr.Chris is right. both exe and fellixombc should go learn how to draw anime or manga.[/quote]Drawing anime and manga is considerably boring. I prefer still-life.

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:26, topic:145126”]Exe, don’t talk like making a signature is a big piece of art. You will show it, use it, and then replace it. Nothing more.[/quote]I talk about it like its art, should I talk about it like its shit?

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:26, topic:145126”]I’m so glad there aren’t too many people like you on graphics forums.[/quote]Yes, we don’t need people to tell people the truth, tell them false things and get their hopes up!

Read full topic

item.title: Beautifuly Horid
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’m so glad there aren’t too many people like you on graphics forums.

Exe, don’t talk like making a signature is a big piece of art. You will show it, use it, and then replace it. Nothing more.

Maybe you should all stop trying to look big going ‘Hey ladies, I usually use 0 C4Ds’, when quite frankly, skill != use of C4Ds.

Go learn some real art instead of arguing about pointless crap like this.

Read full topic

Fellixombc, No you don’t its just smudge c4d’s or just c4d’s going in any direction.
[/quote]
your wrong again bucko. i barley use c4ds, unlike you, i usually use 1 or 2[/quote]
That made no sense you said you barley use them then you say you use 1 or 2.
